The Life and Times of a Beaklon
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: The Life and Times of a Beaklon
By The ShaMan on Thursday, January 15, 2004 - 12:06 pm:

A giant bug with immense power,
Makes small monsters shreik and cower.
He'll smash a Mogi, snap a Mew;
And if you're annoying, he'll break you,too.

He's really slow,but tough and strong.
With a Beaklon,you can't go wrong.
He can ram,dig,punch,and fly.
He makes small monsters run and cry.

A hard-shelled beatle that sprouts from a Worm
He makes small monster writhe and squirm.
When he's victorious,he buzzes with pride.
He makes small monsters want to run and hide.

He'll be your friend,through and through.
He'll even be your bodygaurd,too.
But he's so old, he can't go on.
Give one last chear for the Beaklon.
